title: Cathedral Art SIM132 Bedtime Blessing for Girl Artmetal Square Plaque, 5-Inch
features: Reads "a bedtime blessing - a child is a soul the lord lends to the earth, to be nurtured in faith, from the moment of birth"
5 inch square plaque, hand cast art metal material
Features hand-polished edging and textured back with metal easel, does not hang on wall
Caroline Simas licensed artwork, comes gift boxed
description: Enjoy this decorative plaque by artist Caroline Simas through cathedral art. Made with art metal which is a hand cast, re-cycled zinc aluminum alloy. The plaque is painted and infused with the artist design before being individually hand-polished, creating a lasting keepsake.
